languages.text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 against daemons and for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by a sanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text: The wearer's psy rating is increased by +1 against daemons and for each rank of Imperialis. ! Can only be equipped by a sanctioned psyker.

The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 against daemons and for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by a sanctioned psyker.

The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 against daemons and for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by a sanctioned psyker.

languages.text: 装备者每有1级{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}信念等级，{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}就会提高1级，对抗恶魔时额外提高1级。 ！此头盔只能由合法灵能者装备。
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 against daemons and for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by a sanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text: 装备者每有1级{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}信念等级，{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}就会提高1级，对抗恶魔时额外提高1级。 ！此头盔只能由合法灵能者装备。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Пси-рейтинг{/g} персонажа увеличивается на 1 за каждый ранг {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматика{/g} и еще на 1 в бою против демонов. ! Может использоваться только санкционированным псайкером.
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 against daemons and for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by a sanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text: При атаках против демонов пси-рейтинг персонажа увеличивается на 1 за каждый уровень Империума. ! Может использоваться только санкционированным псайкером.
При атаках против демонов пси-рейтинг персонажа увеличивается на 1 за каждый уровень Империума. ! Может использоваться только санкционированным псайкером.

languages.text: ディーモンに対して、また{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g}のランクごとに、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が+1増加する。 ！公認異能者のみ装着可能。
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 against daemons and for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by a sanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text: ディーモンに対して、また帝国のランクごとに、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が1増加する。 ！公認異能者のみが装着可能。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del portador aumenta +1 contra daemons y por cada rango de {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}. ! Solo lo puede equipar un psíquico autorizado.
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 against daemons and for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by a sanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del portador aumenta +1 contra daemons y por cada rango de Imperialis. ! Solo lo puede equipar un psíquico autorizado.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} des Trägers erhöht sich um +1 gegen Dämonen und für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g}-Rang. ! Kann nur von einem sanktionierten Psioniker ausgerüstet werden.
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 against daemons and for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by a sanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} des Trägers erhöht sich um +1 gegen Dämonen und für jeden Imperialis-Rang. Kann nur von einem sanktionierten Psioniker ausgerüstet werden!

languages.text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} de l'utilisateur augmente de 1 contre les démons et pour chaque rang de {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g}. ! Uniquement utilisable par un psyker assermenté.
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 against daemons and for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by a sanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} de l'utilisateur augmente de +1 contre les démons et pour chaque rang d'Imperialis. ! Uniquement utilisable par un psyker assermenté.
L'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} de l'utilisateur augmente de +1 contre les démons et pour chaque rang d'Imperialis. ! Uniquement utilisable par un psyker assermenté.

languages.text: Takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g}, iblislere karşı {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatik{/g} kanaatinin her kademesi için +1 artar. ! Yalnızca onaylı ruhsezerlerce kuşanılabilir.
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 against daemons and for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by a sanctioned psyker.
